text: 'ina 'anzalna ealayk -ayha alrswl- alquran bialhaqi hdayt llealmyn, 'iilaa tariq alrshad, faman ahtda bnwrh, waeamil bima fyh, wastqam ealaa mnhjh, fnfe dhlk yaeud ealaa nfsh, wman dll baed ma tabayan lah alhda, fa'iinama yaeud drrh ealaa nfsh, walan ydrr allah shyya, wama 'ant -ayha alrswl- ealayhim biwakil tahfaz aemalhm, wthasbhm elyha, wtjbrhm ealaa ma tsha', ma ealayk 'iilaa alblagh
